Package de.hshn.mi.pdbg.basicservice

Interface Patient

All Superinterfaces:
PersistentObject, Person
public interface Patient extends Person
Patient describes a person that is under treatment in a hospital (a patient).

      Parameters:

    • getHealthInsurance

      String getHealthInsurance()
      Returns:
      A patient's health insurance. May return null if it is unset, that is: unknown.

    • getInsuranceNumber

      String getInsuranceNumber()
      Returns:
      A patient's insurance number. May return null if it is unset, that is: unknown.

    • getHospitalStays

      Set<HospitalStay> getHospitalStays()
      Adding HospitalStay objects associated with a patient should be performed via BasicDBService.createHospitalStay(Patient, Ward, java.util.Date).
      Returns:
      A set of HospitalStay objects associated with a patient. If there are no such objects an empty Set (i.e. not null!) has to be returned.
      Throws:
      FetchException - Thrown if an error occurred while fetching an object.
      See Also:
      • BasicDBService.getHospitalStays(long)
